title: My Dream Life

scenes.name: coastal_sunrise_run
scenes.affirmation: I am radiantly healthy and full of energy
scenes.video_prompt: A tall athletic man with light skin and short brown hair in athletic wear runs along a beautiful coastal trail at sunrise. The ocean sparkles to his left, waves crashing gently. He moves with effortless strength and joy. Tracking shot following from the side. Warm morning light, cinematic, saturated colors, shallow depth of field.
